Name: Back 2 School
About the game: Back 2 School is an educational trivia game that pits the player against answering challenging primary school questions to see if they are smart enough to graduate from elementary school. Are you smart enough to pass elementary school? Play Back 2 School today and work out those brain muscles! Features: 20 quizzes with randomly selected questions. This provides replayability and aids in the players learning. Back 2 School now has over 800 unique questions. Questions range in difficulty and cover a wide range of subjects (English, Math, Science, and Social Studies.) Timed quizzes add an additional challenge. But unlike other games, if the timer runs out the test is graded rather than automatically failing the player. This means that even if you run out of time you can still pass if you got enough questions correct. Each quiz the player receives a letter grade which acts as the player score. The player is allowed to retake quizzes to try to achieve higher grades. The end game of Back 2 School consists of reviewing your final report card and trying to get an A+ final grade. The amount of content in Back 2 School we estimate it will take most players 1-2 hours to complete.
